data.label: Google Play Billing
data.description: Google Play 结算服务可让您在 Android 上销售数字内容。本文档介绍了 Google Play 结算服务解决方案的基本构建基块。要决定如何实现特定的 Google Play 结算服务解决方案，您必须了解这些构建基块。

data.label: Google Play Billing
data.description: Google Play Billing Service allows you to sell digital content on Android. This document describes the basic building blocks of Google Play Billing Service solutions. To decide how to implement a specific Google Play Billing Service solution, you must understand these building blocks.
